datoCmsWork.title: Training
datoCmsWork.excerpt: Need to get your devs up to speed quickly? I do React Native trainings tailored to your needs.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Don't waste time and resources on figuring out what works and what doesn't - based on your needs I can cover topics including but not limited to:

  • JavaScript & React (Native) fundamentals
  • Navigation
  • Native modules and native UI controls
  • Styling and theming
  • Unit, integration and e2e testing and best practices
  • Type checking with Flow / TypeScript
  • Animations and Gesture Handling
  • Debugging
  • State management and persistence
  • Optimal Developer Experience
  • Bug tracking and analytics
  • Continuous Integration and App distribution

I deliver a hands-on training that explains important concepts and lets the attendees apply them in practical examples. As a result, your development team will be more confident with React Native and will deliver better results.

The only things you need is being familiar with JavaScript and React, a laptop and a phone.

Shoot me an email!
